text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent sweat.
author: Thomas Edison

text: You can see a lot just by watching.
Author: Yogi Berra

text: A house divided by itself cannot resist.
author: Abraham Lincoln

text: The closer we get to the goal, the harder the difficulties become.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

text: Fate is in your hands and nobody else
author: Byron Pulsifer

text: Be the boss, but not the master.
Author: Lao Tzu

text: Nothing happens if we don't dream first.
author: Karl Sandburg

text: A good start is half the battle.
Author: Aristotle

text: Life is a learning experience only if you learn.
Author: Yogi Berra

text: Self-complacency is detrimental to progress.
Author: Margaret Sangster

text: The world comes from within. Don't look for it from the outside.
Author: Buddha

text: What you give is what you get.
author: Byron Pulsifer

text: We can only learn to love by loving.
author: Iris Murdoch

text: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
author: Karen Clarke

text: You will see this when you believe it.
Author: Wayne Dyer

text: Today is tomorrow that we worried about yesterday.
It's easier to see mistakes on someone else's paper.
Every person dies. Not every person is actually alive.
To lead people, follow them.
Author: Lao Tzu

text: Having nothing, he has nothing to lose.
author: William Shakespeare

text: The only problem is work clothes.
author: Henry J. Kaiser

text: Rolling stone does not collect moss.
author: Publius Syrus

text: Ideas are the starting point of all states.
author: Napoleon Hill

text: Everything in life is good luck.
Author: Donald Trump

text: Doing nothing is better than doing nothing.
Author: Lao Tzu

text: Trust yourself. You know more than you think.
author: Benjamin Spock

text: Study the past if you want to guess the future.
author: Confucius

text: The day is already blessed, find peace in it.
The whole truth is revealed from error to error.
Author: Sigmund Freud

text: Well done is better than well said
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Bite off more than you can chew and then swallow.
author: Ella Williams

text: Come up with your own salvation. Don't rely on others.
Author: Buddha

text: One today is worth two tomorrow.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Once you choose hope, anything is possible.
author: Christopher Reeve

text: God always follows the simplest path.
Author: Albert Einstein

text: One fails to succeed.
Author: Charles Kettering

text: Great things are born from small things.
Training is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere
author: Chinese proverb

text: Be who you want to appear.
Author: Socrates

text: The world is always in motion.
Author: V. Naipaul

text: Never mistake activity for achievement.
author: John Wooden

text: What bothers you controls you.
author: Haddon Robinson

text: A person looks to the future together with the past.
author: Pearl Tank

text: Targets are fuel for the achievement furnace.
author: Brian Tracy

text: He who sows virtue will also reap honor.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

text: If possible, be kind. It is always possible.
Author: Dalai Lama

text: Talk does not cook rice
author: Chinese proverb

text: Who thinks is capable.
Author: Buddha

text: A goal without a plan is just desire.
author: Larry Elder

text: To be successful, we must first believe in what we can.
Author: Michael Korda

text: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
Author: Albert Einstein

text: A weed is nothing more than a flower in disguise.
author: James Lowell
